mapper.select: SELECT FORM_CODE, FORM_NAME FROM DOC_FORM ORDER BY FORM_CODE
SELECT PERIOD_CODE, PERIOD FROM DOC_RETENTION_PERIOD ORDER BY PERIOD_CODE
SELECT SECURITY_CODE, SECURITY_LEVLE, READABLE_POSITION FROM DOC_SECURITY_LEVLE ORDER BY SECURITY_CODE

SELECT DF.FORM_CODE, DT.FORM_DETAIL_CODE, DFM.FORM_DETAIL_SEQ, DT.FORM_DETAIL_NAME, DT.FORM_DETAIL_TYPE FROM DOC_FORM_MAPPING DFM INNER JOIN DOC_FORM_DETAIL_TEMPLATE DT ON DT.FORM_DETAIL_CODE = DFM.FORM_DETAIL_CODE INNER JOIN DOC_FORM DF ON DF.FORM_CODE = DFM.FORM_CODE WHERE DF.FORM_CODE = #{formCode} ORDER BY DFM.FORM_DETAIL_SEQ
SELECT APPR_TYPE_CODE, APPR_TYPE_NAME FROM APPROVAL_TYPE ORDER BY APPR_TYPE_CODE
SELECT DEPT_CODE, DEPT_NAME FROM DEPT WHERE DEPT_STATUS = 'N'

SELECT E.EMP_CODE, E.COM_CODE, E.DEPT_CODE, E.RANK_CODE, E.DEPT_CODE, E.JOB_TYPES_CODE, E.EMP_JOB_CODE, E.RIGHT_CODE, E.EMP_NAME, E.EMP_ID, E.EMP_PWD, E.EMP_E_MAIL, E.EMP_BIRTHDAY, E.EMP_TEL, E.EMP_PHONE, E.EMP_JOIN_DATE, E.EMP_PROMOTION_DATE, E.EMP_ADDRESS1, E.EMP_ADDRESS2, E.EMP_STATUS, E.EMP_ETC, E.EMP_ACCOUNT_NO, E.EMP_PROFILE_NAME, E.EMP_LAST_LOGIN_DATE, E.EMP_FILE_NAME, D.DEPT_NAME, R.RANK_NAME FROM EMP E INNER JOIN DEPT D ON E.DEPT_CODE = D.DEPT_CODE INNER JOIN RANK R ON E.RANK_CODE = R.RANK_CODE WHERE EMP_STATUS = 'N'
